Neutrino_Bolt.help: A very quick, but low damage attack. Neutrino Blast can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Neutrino_Bolt.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the Neutrino Bolt.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Irradiate.help: You can emit lethal amounts of radiation in all directions, damaging all nearby foes for a short time. Like other Radiation attacks, this power can bypass some of a target's defenses. Irradiate severely reduces the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Irradiate.targetHelp: You are irradiated and taking damage over time. Your Defense has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.

Electron_Haze.help: A short range conical blast of free electrons. This attack can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. It can also knock some targets down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Electron_Haze.targetHelp: The Electron Haze has reduced your Defenses.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Cosmic_Burst.help: Cosmic Burst smashes the target with cosmic particles. The attack is very short range, but the damage is devastating and can leave most targets Disoriented and with reduced Defense. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Cosmic_Burst.targetHelp: You are disoriented and your Defenses are reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Neutron_Bomb.help: This devastating attack lobs an explosive sphere of deadly radiation, damaging the target and all nearby foes. Neutron Bomb can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Neutron_Bomb.targetHelp: The Neutron Bomb has reduced your Defenses.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Enervating__Field.help: You have been exposed to an Enervating Field of radiation. Your damage and damage resistance are reduced.
Enervating__Field.targetHelp: You have been exposed to an Enervating Field of radiation. Your damage and damage resistance are reduced.
Enervating__Field.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} reduced the damage potential of all nearby foes.

Lingering_Radiation.help: You can emit Lingering Radiation that reduces the attack rate, movement speed, and Regeneration rate of the target, and all nearby foes. Recharge: Slow
Lingering_Radiation.targetHelp: Your Attack rate, Running speed, and Regeneration rate have been reduced by the Lingering Radiation.

EM_Pulse.help: You are Held by the EM Pulse and your Regeneration Rate is reduced.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} shocks you with his {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
